slides.label: Chicken Sandwich Combo
slides.content: 1 chicken sandwich with 1 flavor, small fries, and 1 large cold drink

slides.label: 8 PC Flavored Wings
slides.content: 8 classic (bone-in) wings with 1 flavor of lemon pepper, classic hot, honey garlic, or honey BBQ and 1 dip

slides.label: 15 PC Flavored Wings
slides.content: 15 classic (bone-in) wings with 2 flavors of lemon pepper, classic hot, honey garlic, or honey BBQ and 1 dip

slides.label: 15 Boneless Wings
slides.content: 15 boneless wings with 2 flavors of lemon pepper, classic hot, honey garlic, or honey BBQ and 1 dip

slides.label: 8 PC Chicken Nuggets
slides.quote: Eat them up. Eat them up!
slides.content: 8 chicken nuggets served with 2 dips of ranch, honey mustards, or ketchup

slides.label: Chicken Strips Bowl
slides.content: 4 chicken strips served with medium fries and 2 dips of ranch, honey mustards, or ketchup
